Name: Bold Blade
About the game: Bold Blade, the bitesize pixel art action RPG where your sword keeps getting bigger ! Pursuing the legend of a sword powerful enough to fell mountains, you journey to a remote island populated by demons. Make your sword as huge as you want! What kind of sword is your favorite? Balanced all-rounder The longest blade Wider than the ocean If your sword alone isn't cutting it, purchase a variety of items to boost your passive abilities. Or make offerings to the gods to improve your stats. Enhance your swordplay with a variety of psi powers. Blast them away! Heal your wounds! Shock your enemies! Want a change of pace? Play a round of Bug Boshers, a fast paced defense shooting game. .
